name: Simple Social Login by Astoundify
author: Astoundify

sections.installation:
To install this plugin, please refer to the guide here: https://codex.wordpress.org/Managing_Plugins#Manual_Plugin_Installation

Visit Settings > Simple Social Login and complete configuration.
sections.changelog:
1.3.0: November 27, 2020

  • Compatibility check with php 7.4
  • Compatibility check with WordPress 5.5.3

1.2.0: January 31, 2018

  • Fix: Ensure build contains all vendor files.

1.1.0: December 7, 2017

  • New: Move login options to the top of the WooCommerce form.

1.0.0: December 1, 2017

  • New: Initial release.
sections.description:
Social login options for WordPress. Currently supports:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Google

Documentation

Usage instructions for this plugin can be found on our documentation: http://docs.astoundify.com/.

Support Policy

Please contact https://astoundify.com/account/new-ticket/ for technical support regarding the plugin. We are partnered with and highly recommend WP Curve (https://astoundify.com/go/wpcurve) Envato Studio (https://astoundify.com/go/envato-studio/) or Codeable (https://astoundify.com/go/codeable/) if you need help customizing your website.
